summary: A family of Appalachian children live together in the backwoods so that they can stay together after the death of their widower father.
cast: Julie Gholson|Jan Smithers|Matthew Burrill|Helen Harmon|Sudie Bond|Rance Howard|Tom Spratley|Alice Beardsley|Bob Cole|Helen Bragdon|Harry Dean Stanton|Martha Nell Hardy|Resi Sinclair|Gregg Parrish|Janine Hughes|Karen Moody|Tom Guinn|George Stenhouse
title: Donde florecen los lirios
